sections.content: Hi there! Thank you so much for your interest in working together. Please fill the contact form below or send me an email at [dhoolia.pranav@gmail.com](mailto:dhoolia.pranav@gmail.com).

form_fields.name: consent
form_fields.label: I understand that this form is storing my submitted information so I can be contacted.

sections.title: Luxury, Streetwear, Gaming, Antiques
sections.content: Experience a full range of authentic stuff in India.

grid_items.title: Luxury
grid_items.content: Get a full range of luxury items without paying import duties or taxes. Verified by acclaimed brands.

grid_items.title: Streetwear
grid_items.content: Get the latest trends in streetwear as soon as they drop in the market.

grid_items.title: Gaming
grid_items.content: Get a set of collectibles and gaming accessories at a discounted rate.

grid_items.title: Antiques
grid_items.content: Get limited antique collections at discounted rates. You won't find them anywhere else!

testimonials.author: Sean Salazar
testimonials.content: Exto is one of the best brands for luxury. They always have what you want. Also, all the items are verified. Shopping with them has a unique experience. Definitely give it a try you won;t regret it!

testimonials.author: Aubrey Hoover
testimonials.content: Their gaming collection is one of the most unique I have seen. They always deliver high quality products and services. I have been a huge fan of their exclusive collection for more than 2 years.

testimonials.author: Deegan Wallace
testimonials.content: I'm a big fan of antiques, and with that being said, Exto has one of the most exclusive antiques collection I have ever seen. They always deliver on time and have the best customer experience. It has been a pleasure buying from Exto.

sections.subtitle: Always stay updates with the latest trends

frontmatter.title: Style Guide
frontmatter.subtitle: The style guide provides you with a blueprint of default post and page styles. The style guide is also a great reference for suggested typographic treatment and styles for your content.
